title: BitcoinCasino.to
author: BitcoinCasino.to
created_time: May 26, 2023, 01:45:36 PMLast edit: May 29, 2023, 09:15:27 AM by BitcoinCasino.to
content: Hi,This is the official thread of BitcoinCasino.to - a comprehensive review and comparison website for crypto casinos.Our ambition is to help players easily discover trusted Bitcoin and altcoin casinos by finding, testing and reviewing as many as possible of the operators that support cryptocurrency payments.So far we’ve identified more than 1400 crypto casinos and the list is growing on a daily basis. As it takes some time to properly review a casino, we might not ever be able to catch up – but we’ll try our best.In addition to our own experiences of signing up, depositing, playing, withdrawing and testing the support function we do keep an eye on the overall reputation among players and professional reviewers as well.Now, we would humbly like to ask this great community for some feedback so we can improve the website further and make it even more useful.@Players: What are the most important things that you want to learn from a casino review? What kind of content, features or tools would you personally find useful? What other kinds of improvements could we make to the site? We have just enabled visitor comments as well so if you agree or disagree about our assessment of any particular casino you can quickly and easily let your voice be heard on the site.@Webmasters: There are several other great crypto casino guides and review websites that we deeply respect and appreciate. If you’re a webmaster and have an idea on how we can possibly collaborate and help the community together, feel free to reach out.@Operators: If you haven’t already been reviewed you’re probably already on our TODO list. If you want to be prioritized let us know. Positive player feedback on this forum and/or strong reviews from other reputable websites could help expedite your case.In addition to private messages here, you can also reach us through Telegram: https://t.me/bitcoincasinotoLooking forward to any kind of feedback. If you know of any crypto casino that we’ve missed, feel free to highlight it in this thread.If you’re new to the site you can find it here: https://bitcoincasino.to/Thank you for your time.---Updates based on feedback2023-05-27: Added a "+ BitcoinTalk Thread" in the feature list next to casinos with official threads in this forum.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinCasino.to on May 26, 2023, 01:45:36 PM<snip>I might had missed it, but did you ever mentioned from your site about how you review those casinos listed from your site? I was actually looking for it.I commend you for having a very informative website. I like it, I think it'll be a helpful guide specially to new players who look for some guides.  Great job. Welcome to the forum and good luck.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Only Fortunejack that is on this forum that I saw on your website. There are many gambling sites on this forum like https://livecasino.io and Stake.com but you did not mention them.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on May 26, 2023, 02:06:04 PMOnly Fortunejack that is on this forum that I saw on your website. There are many gambling sites on this forum like https://livecasino.io and Stake.com but you did not mention them.That's a good observation.We actually have a double digit number of reviews live for many popular brands, including Stake (see https://bitcoincasino.to/reviews/stake/), that are currently not on the main list on the index page. There could be several different reasons for this but the most common one is that we simply haven't talked to them yet (either due to time constraints on our end -- or someone not getting back to us when reaching out).The good ones, including Stake, should hopefully all be up there very soon.Thank you for the feedback!

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: Good luck to you - I haven`t looked at your site thoroughly (yet) but I will be happy to see serious sites providing honest information with regard to crypto gambling.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on May 26, 2023, 02:04:03 PMQuote from: BitcoinCasino.to on May 26, 2023, 01:45:36 PM<snip>I might had missed it, but did you ever mentioned from your site about how you review those casinos listed from your site? I was actually looking for it.I commend you for having a very informative website. I like it, I think it'll be a helpful guide specially to new players who look for some guides.  Great job. Welcome to the forum and good luck. There is a section on the index called "How we rate and compare crypto casinos" and hopefully the reviews themselves should be relatively self-explanatory as well (if not, we definitely have to fix that).Thank you!

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: efialtis on May 26, 2023, 02:49:44 PMGood luck to you - I haven`t looked at your site thoroughly (yet) but I will be happy to see serious sites providing honest information with regard to crypto gambling. Much appreciated, especially coming from someone who has contributed so much to the crypto gambling community like yourself. Keep up the great work!

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinCasino.to on May 26, 2023, 02:39:20 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on May 26, 2023, 02:06:04 PMOnly Fortunejack that is on this forum that I saw on your website. There are many gambling sites on this forum like https://livecasino.io and Stake.com but you did not mention them.That's a good observation.We actually have a double digit number of reviews live for many popular brands, including Stake (see https://bitcoincasino.to/reviews/stake/), that are currently not on the main list on the index page. There could be several different reasons for this but the most common one is that we simply haven't talked to them yet (either due to time constraints on our end -- or someone not getting back to us when reaching out).The good ones, including Stake, should hopefully all be up there very soon.Thank you for the feedback!You mean you want to talk to the casino owner first before reviewing the casino? The high rank on search engines and number of hits a month will be a good data for a casino to notice your review site. Nice layout though and navigation.I was expecting to read the review about the first BitStarz but was directly sent to a ref link.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on May 26, 2023, 02:06:04 PMOnly Fortunejack that is on this forum that I saw on your website. There are many gambling sites on this forum like https://livecasino.io and Stake.com but you did not mention them.Jackbit, Betplay, Winz and Fairspin are also on the list which have an ANN thread here on the forum. They launch their signature campaign too in the past that makes me remember them when browsing all the listed casino.I’m also surprised why does top casino here in the forum like Stake, Duelbits, Sportbets and so on are not listed while a bunch of unknown casino is on the website. I think this list is useless to post here since forum user can’t appreciate all those casino that doesn’t have ANN thread here due to our nature of being cautious to all unknown casino.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on May 26, 2023, 02:57:56 PMQuote from: BitcoinCasino.to on May 26, 2023, 02:39:20 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on May 26, 2023, 02:06:04 PMOnly Fortunejack that is on this forum that I saw on your website. There are many gambling sites on this forum like https://livecasino.io and Stake.com but you did not mention them.That's a good observation.We actually have a double digit number of reviews live for many popular brands, including Stake (see https://bitcoincasino.to/reviews/stake/), that are currently not on the main list on the index page. There could be several different reasons for this but the most common one is that we simply haven't talked to them yet (either due to time constraints on our end -- or someone not getting back to us when reaching out).The good ones, including Stake, should hopefully all be up there very soon.Thank you for the feedback!You mean you want to talk to the casino owner first before reviewing the casino? The high rank on search engines and number of hits a month will be a good data for a casino to notice your review site. Nice layout though and navigation.I was expecting to read the review about the first BitStarz but was directly sent to a ref link.We don't need to talk to a casino to review them but we prefer to talk to them before more actively promoting them.If you click on the casino's name in the "Review" column, just next to their rating, you will be taken to the review.We will consider if it makes more sense to link the logo to the review, rather than to the website, as well. Thank you for the feedback.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Nice seeing this thread, I hope more casinos are going to be added, especially those that have ANN thread on this forum.Quote from: AbuBhakar on May 26, 2023, 03:06:07 PMJackbit, Betplay, Winz and Fairspin are also on the list which have an ANN thread here on the forum. They launch their signature campaign too in the past that makes me remember them when browsing all the listed casino.These are just few. What about Flush, Stake, Livecasino, Sportsbet, Duelbit, Rollbit, Roobet, BK8, Duelbit, Trustdice, Betcoin and many others. If you go to gambling board, there are still more.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on May 26, 2023, 03:06:07 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on May 26, 2023, 02:06:04 PMOnly Fortunejack that is on this forum that I saw on your website. There are many gambling sites on this forum like https://livecasino.io and Stake.com but you did not mention them.Jackbit, Betplay, Winz and Fairspin are also on the list which have an ANN thread here on the forum. They launch their signature campaign too in the past that makes me remember them when browsing all the listed casino.I’m also surprised why does top casino here in the forum like Stake, Duelbits, Sportbets and so on are not listed while a bunch of unknown casino is on the website. I think this list is useless to post here since forum user can’t appreciate all those casino that doesn’t have ANN thread here due to our nature of being cautious to all unknown casino.We think that there's value to testing and reviewing as many operators as possible, regardless of if they have a thread here or not.But as we'll be adding more operators we will definitely look into adding some kind of certificate or symbol to our lists to indicate that a particular brand is (or isn't) represented on this forum as well.Hopefully that will make the list more useful to you and others.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on May 26, 2023, 03:27:32 PMNice seeing this thread, I hope more casinos are going to be added, especially those that have ANN thread on this forum.Quote from: AbuBhakar on May 26, 2023, 03:06:07 PMJackbit, Betplay, Winz and Fairspin are also on the list which have an ANN thread here on the forum. If you go to gambling board, there are still more.Thank you for the suggestions. We'll have all of them reviewed and listed (if they're good, as expected).

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Your review website has many types of contents for guests and it is good but I notice that your site does not have any part about Provably Fair Verifier.You can consider to add it on your site as Review will be not fully completed and correct if you don't use Provably Fair Verifier to test games on a casino you review. It's important for Crypto Casino as gamblers can verify whether a game is provably fair. It gives more trust about one casino and provided games for their users.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Welcome on your forum introducing as a casino review site, we are very happy to see you here.I've seen some of the other reviews about the casinos reviewed by this site, but I don't see some of the casinos that I often play here? Like Sportsbet, Bitcasino and Duelbits will you add this to your personal experience playing at the casino?I'm waiting for more reviews but I hope that in the future there are more casinos on this forum.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: OcTradism on May 26, 2023, 03:47:45 PMYour review website has many types of contents for guests and it is good but I notice that your site does not have any part about Provably Fair Verifier.You can consider to add it on your site as Review will be not fully completed and correct if you don't use Provably Fair Verifier to test games on a casino you review. It's important for Crypto Casino as gamblers can verify whether a game is provably fair. It gives more trust about one casino and provided games for their users.Agreed that it's highly relevant but not as straight forward as reviewing some other things due to limitations in supported casinos and games. Will consider, discuss and analyze others implementations. Thanks!

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, I was thinking you should atleast give us a pictorial excerpts of how your website looks like to make your thread look catchy based on your topic.  I commend you for the copper member account upgrade seems you really have a good managerial skills and you know how to abide by forum policies when you identify with any.However, I know you are new here and I will advise you to take cognizance of casinos here as there are a million and one of them here with good reputation. This will add more feathers to your wings here. Your website looks a bit dull and boring could you make the graphics and colouration a bit more attractive and sharp.We are not kids you know. Why put up a blur and animated image of Jack. M. your supposed author or psuedo owner  if you may like.  It is even better you did not put any image there only write up than putting such there.

comments.author: BitcoinCasino.to
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on May 26, 2023, 04:50:07 PMOP, I was thinking you should atleast give us a pictorial excerpts of how your website looks like to make your thread look catchy based on your topic.  I commend you for the copper member account upgrade seems you really have a good managerial skills and you know how to abide by forum policies when you identify with any.However, I know you are new here and I will advise you to take cognizance of casinos here as there are a million and one of them here with good reputation. This will add more feathers to your wings here. Your website looks a bit dull and boring could you make the graphics and colouration a bit more attractive and sharp.We are not kids you know. Why put up a blur and animated image of Jack. M. your supposed author or psuedo owner  if you may like.  It is even better you did not put any image there only write up than putting such there.Good suggestion regarding a screenshot and yes, it currently does look a bit dull in comparison to some other sites out there.Regarding authors and bylines it's tricky. If you skip it completely you'll have some people complaining about that. But if you go with full names and unedited profile pictures someone might risk real life abuse because they wrote something that someone didn't like. And if you do something in between someone will be displeased with that as well  We'll see if we can come up with something better.Thanks!

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I just went to your site to check truly if you have reviews for 1400+ casinos just as you have claimed and indeed I found the list there, but something caught my attention. For example, Duelbits.com I had to check the review of the casino I'm currently promoting and found several things I'll like you to clear up for me. First, I saw the name Duelbits.com but they was no link for the review it only just showed me the name, the license type etcetera nothing more.Second, I noticed that most of casinos there including Duelbits.com have "untested" so how do you review a casino you haven't tested before? Is it based on what you saw on their website or what?
